categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: During the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, a battle occurred on the resource-rich planet of Velmor sometime between 3681 BBY and 3653 BBY. General Korvan of the Republic Military commanded the Republic forces in a ground battle for control of the planet.

The battle on Velmor was first mentioned in the Codex entry for General Korvan in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011.
